item.title: Resources for railgun development
item.description: Metasploit’s Railgun is awesome, but getting things to work correctly can be a pain. Here are some of the resources that have helped me out: System Error Codes.aspx”) - This is hands down the best resource you have, it will tell you what that stupid “5” or “1314” means in your return value. Keep this tab open to circumvent crazed bovine attacks. theForger’s Win32 API Programming Tutorial - A really good place to start when you are getting to know the Windows API and the frustrations that come along with it.
